org.codeavengers.main.data.db

Interface DatabasePersister

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Persister
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPersister, GenericReadOnlyPersister

    public interface DatabasePersister
extends Persister
    DatabasePersister class which defines interactions with the Database over JDBC only. For queries or direct database manipulations this class should be used.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    abhishek

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DBEntity query(java.lang.String query)
      This method simply allows the execution of a query without any additional query parameters or extractors for data processing.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.codeavengers.main.data.Persister

        identify

    • Method Detail

      • query

        DBEntity query(java.lang.String query)
        This method simply allows the execution of a query without any additional query parameters or extractors for data processing.
        Parameters:
        query - Query to be executed
        Returns:
        The DB Entity to be populated with the query results
        Since:
        1.0
